anpl:
def main(input_grid: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    x = "get the x of consecutive horizontal lines which are black"(input_grid)
    y = "get the y of consecutive vertical lines which are black"(input_grid)
    (top_left, top_right, bottom_left, bottom_right) = "four grids separated by the horizontal and vertical lines"(input_grid, x, y)
    colors = "get another color in each grid besides black"(top_left, top_right, bottom_left, bottom_right)
    output_grid = "get the grid which color is different from others"(colors, top_left, top_right, bottom_left, bottom_right)
    return output_grid
